mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_no, menu_name, menu_price, category) values (#{menu_no}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{category})
insert into menu_photo (photo_no, menu_no, upload_name, save_name, file_size, save_type) values (menu_photo_seq.nextval, #{menu_no}, #{upload_name}, #{save_name}, #{file_size}, #{save_type})
mapper.select: select M.*, P.upload_name, P.save_name from menu M inner join menu_photo P on M.menu_no=P.menu_no order by M.menu_name asc
mapper.update: update menu set menu_name=#{menu_name}, menu_price=#{menu_price}, category=#{category} where menu_no=#{menu_no}
update menu_photo set upload_name=#{upload_name}, save_name=#{save_name}, file_size=#{file_size}, save_type=#{save_type} where menu_no=#{menu_no}
mapper.select: select M.*, P.upload_name, P.save_name from menu M inner join menu_photo P on M.menu_no=P.menu_no where M.category = #{category} order by M.menu_name asc
mapper.delete: delete branch_menu where branch_no=#{branch_no} and menu_no=#{menu_no}
mapper.insert: insert into branch_menu (bm_no, branch_no, menu_no, menu_status) values (bm_seq.nextval, #{branch_no}, #{menu_no}, #{menu_status})
mapper.update: update branch_menu set menu_status=#{menu_status} where branch_no=#{branch_no} and menu_no=#{menu_no}
